ToDo list MetaFllow

  • Core
    • Create GIT repository for the system
    • Revitalise execution of script on server side
    • On node context menu, put: Open Content, Edit Content. So that we could have, for instance, an HTML editor (Edit Content) and Web Viewer (Open Content)
    • Make in MetaFlow the concept of user and login
    • Make a String-JSON editor in MetaFlow
    • Speak about an index server for MetaFlow so to have a global search like in Confluence
    • Implement for cloud solution and user management (which DB)
    • Implement Drag and Drop on GoJS canvas and on all editors
      • https://gojs.net/latest/samples/htmlDragDrop.html
      • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13578657/how-to-drag-an-image-after-drop-onto-html5-canvas
    • Integration with other tools: Slack, Jitsi,Dropbox, ...
  • this is another rich text editor https://prosemirror.net/
  • â€‹Integrator CG
    • indentation should be done in a copy
    • make optional in the CG to keep the content of a block if no data is available
    • Implement the run button of integrator for other code than HTML
  • Ace
    • Popup menu in ACE for template generation statement and hide them
  • Marketing
    • Find a new name for MetaFlow (Graph, Visual, Iconic, ...) like OMEGA, INFINITY,...
